getDynamicUpdateVisitor

public static org.smartfrog.sfcore.componentdescription.CDVisitor getDynamicUpdateVisitor(boolean addAll,
                                                                                          java.lang.Boolean[] res)
Gets an object implementing a visitor pattern that performs all the dynamic updates of bindings in a component hierarchy.

Parameters:
addAll - True if we also register NORMAL bindings and not only the ones scheduled to be added (TO_ADD)
res - A pre-allocated boolean array for the result, i.e., True if all are updated OK, false otherwise.
Returns:
An object implementing a visitor pattern that performs all the dynamic updates of bindings in a component hierarchy.

register

public void register()
              throws DNSModifierException
Registers a DNS binding update in the name server. It needs to have been inserted in the component hierarchy in order to work.

Specified by:
register in interface DNSBindingIP
Throws:
DNSModifierException - if an error occurs while registering the update.

sendUpdate

public void sendUpdate(org.xbill.DNS.Update update)
                throws DNSModifierException
Sends an update and analyzes the response, throwing an exception if it notifies an error while updating the DNS server.

Parameters:
update - An update message to be sent.
Throws:
DNSModifierException - If the response message notified an error.
